name: Ratcatcher
description:
Castles are the perfect place to start a family, for rats.  The king has hired you to travel the kingdom's castles, forts, and keeps and rid them of the rat infestation before diseases spread.

Use the tools of your trade to remove the rats, break their nests, and keep away from the highborns lest you be punished for being in their sight.

Tech Demo Instructions
ESDF to move
R to use primary action
SPACE to attack

The tech demo is a poc of the custom game engine. It's not a working game by any means and probably has crash bugs aplenty but its something before starting work on the actual 7DRL
